introduction.text1: Welcome to the Gameexa development roadmap! We're committed to making Gameexa the ultimate gaming platform for players worldwide.
introduction.text2: This page provides transparent information about our progress, current work, and future plans. Your feedback and suggestions are invaluable to us.
introduction.highlight: We strive to make Gameexa the best platform for gamers and continuously work on its improvement. Here you'll find information about our achievements, current tasks, and what we're preparing for you in the future.

completed.feature1: Added user registration and profile system
completed.feature3: Created responsive design for all devices
completed.fix2: Resolved application crash on certain actions

project1.title: Main Page Redesign
project1.desc: Complete overhaul of the main page with cosmic theme and improved user experience

project2.title: Discord Integration
project2.desc: Seamless integration with Discord server for community building

task1.title: In-Game Achievement System
task1.desc: Developing a comprehensive achievement system for tracking player progress

task2.title: Page Loading Optimization
task2.desc: Improving website performance and loading speeds

task3.title: New Analytics Integration
task3.desc: Integrating advanced analytics tools for better user experience

inProgress.prioritiesText: Currently, our main priority is improving website performance and expanding social interaction features.

contribute.feedbackText: Your ideas help us improve! Share your thoughts and suggestions for new features.
contribute.bugReportText: Found a bug? Help us fix it by reporting the issue with detailed information.
contribute.supportText: Love Gameexa? Support our development and help us grow!

faq.q1: When will feature X be added?
faq.a1: We're working on it and will update the progress in the 'What's Currently in Progress' section.
faq.a2: Yes! Use the feedback form above or discuss on our Discord server.
faq.q3: How often do you update the roadmap?
faq.a3: We update this page regularly as we complete tasks and start new ones.
